import React, { useState, useContext } from 'react' import { v4 } from "uuid"; import { ProductContext } from "../ProductContext"; export default function Navbar() { const [products, setProducts] = useContext(ProductContext) const [menu, setMenu] = useState(false) const [value, setValue] = useState("") const addTodo = (e) => { e.preventDefault() setProducts([...products, { "id": v4(), "value": value, "done": false }]) setValue("") } return (

Product Search

setMenu(!menu)} className={`navbar-burger burger ${menu ? "is-active" : ""}`} aria-label="menu" aria-expanded="false" data-target="navbarBasicExample">

setValue(e.target.value)} className="input" />

) }
